Title: IT Executive (Developer)

2. Microsoft office 365:

3. Microsoft ASP.NET execution:

• Connect and manage data using Microsoft SQL Server, REST APIs, and other standard connectors.

Title: Purchasing Manager
Company: Vingroup
Location: Technopark Tower, Vinhomes Ocean Park, Đa Tốn, Gia Lâm, Hanoi, Vietnam, 7 Bằng Lăng 1 Vinhomes Riverside, Long Biên, Hà Nội
Job Description:
VinFast is a pioneering electric vehicle (EV) company committed to revolutionizing the automotive industry
with sustainable and innovative mobility solutions. As a leading player in the EV market, VinFast is dedicated to
delivering high-quality, cutting-edge electric vehicles that redefine the driving experience. Our team consists of
passionate professionals driven by a shared vision of creating a greener and more sustainable future through innovation,
technology, and excellence.

This role will be responsible for leading our global procurement function. The Chief of Purchasing will be
responsible for developing and executing world-class procurement strategies that optimize costs, enhance supplier
relationships, mitigate risks, and drive innovation across our supply chain.

This strategic leadership role requires a proven track record in transforming procurement operations,
leveraging technology, and building high-performing teams.

Position Responsibilities
• Define and implement a comprehensive global procurement strategy aligned with the company's overall
business objectives.
• Lead all aspects of strategic sourcing, supplier selection, contract negotiation, and supplier performance
management.
• Identify and implement cost-aving initiatives while ensuring quality, compliance, and continuity of supply.
• Build and maintain strong, collaborative relationships with key suppliers to foster long-term partnerships and
innovation.
• Develop and mentor a high-performing procurement team, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and
excellence.
• Drive the adoption of best practices, digital tools, and data analytics to enhance procurement efficiency and
effectiveness.
• Manage and mitigate supply chain risks, ensuring business resilience and ethical sourcing practices.
• Collaborate closely with internal stakeholders across departments (e.g., Finance, Operations, R&D) to
understand their needs and ensure procurement supports their goals.
Job Requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in Supply Chain Management, Business Administration, or a related field; MBA or Master's
preferred.
• 8+ years of progressive experience in procurement leadership roles, with a significant portion at a strategic
level
• Demonstrated success in developing and executing global procurement strategies that deliver significant cost
savings and operational efficiencies.
• Strong negotiation skills with a proven ability to manage complex contracts and supplier relationships.
• Deep understanding of supply chain dynamics, risk management, and ethical sourcing.
• Experience with procurement technologies and digital transformation initiatives.
• Exceptional leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to influence stakeholders at
all levels.

Title: Chuyên Viên Phát Triển Kinh Doanh Cấp Cao - Senior BD Specialist (Water Treatment)
Company: Navigos Search's Client
Location: Hà Nội, Bac Ninh Provine, Hanoi
Job Description:
Khách hàng Navigos Search là công ty vốn đầu tư nước ngoài hoạt động trong lĩnh vực xử lý nước thải cần tuyển vị trí chuyên viên phát triển kinh doanh cấp cao phụ trách các công việc sau:

- Phát triển kinh doanh và bán thiết bị xử lý nước thải/nước tinh khiết cho các nhà máy tại miền Bắc Việt Nam (chủ yếu là Hà Nội, Bắc Ninh, Hải Phòng đến Hà Nam).
- Tiếp cận các nhà máy mới (đặc biệt là các nhà máy đang mở rộng dây chuyền sản xuất) và đề xuất nâng cấp hệ thống xử lý nước thải, tập trung vào các công ty địa phương tại Việt Nam.
- Quản lý khách hàng hiện tại và xử lý các dự án cải tạo/sửa chữa.
- Thu thập thông tin kỹ thuật/thị trường, xây dựng mối quan hệ và tận dụng mối quan hệ với các công ty sản xuất và xây dựng.
- Báo cáo hoạt động thông qua báo cáo bán hàng hàng tuần.
Job Requirements:
- Tốt nghiệp đại học, chuyên ngành kỹ thuật, khoa học.
- Kinh nghiệm bán hàng/phát triển sản phẩm tại nhà máy, xí nghiệp, ngành công nghiệp kỹ thuật và xây dựng.
- Mạng lưới quan hệ rộng rãi tại Việt Nam (mối quan hệ với các nhà máy, đối tác trong ngành).
- Khả năng làm việc độc lập và chủ động.
- Yêu cầu có bằng lái xe (phải lái xe đến nhà máy khách hàng).
- Ứng viên có thể ở Bắc Ninh hoặc Hà Nội (nếu ở Hà Nội có thể làm remote)

Title: Financial Planning and Analysis Manager
Company: Phú Hưng Life
Location: Số 08, Phú Mỹ Hưng Tower, Hoàng Văn Thái, Tân Phú, Quận 7, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, Tầng 20, Tòa nhà Phú Mỹ Hưng Tower, 08 Hoàng Văn Thái, Phường Tân Phú, Quận 7, TP.HCM
Job Description:
Job Purpose:
We are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented FP&A professional to join our Finance team in Phu Hung Life. The FP&A Manager will be responsible for financial planning, forecasting, performance reporting, and strategic analysis to support business growth and profitability. This role partners closely with Actuarial, Accounting, Distribution, Operations, and senior leadership to provide financial insights that drive decision-making.

The main tasks and responsibilities include but are not limited to:
1/ Financial Planning and Forecasting:
- Lead the preparation of annual budgets, monthly/quarterly forecast, and long-range financial plans.
- Develop and maintain financial models, including scenario-based forecasting models, to project and manage financial indicators and profitabilities.
- Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) and deliver variance analysis, provide business insights against plan/forecast.
2/ Performance Report and Analysis:
- Prepare monthly and quarterly financial report for Management and Corporate, highlighting trends, risks and opportunities.
- Analyze drivers of profitability, across revenue, expenses, and investment income.
- Support regulatory financial reporting requirements.
3/ Strategic and Business Partnering:
- Partner with Actuarial, Distribution and Operations team to evaluate profitability and capital implication.
- Provide financial insights to support strategic initiatives such as market expansions.
- Work with Investment and Accounting to optimize capital allocation and cash flow management.
- Be in charge in expense management including working with all departments to optimize expense efficiency.
4/ Process improvement:
- Enhance financial models, tools and dashboard to improve forecasting accuracy and efficiency.
- Implement best practices in financial analysis, reporting and planning.
- Support automation and digital transformation initiatives within Finance and Accounting department.
Job Requirements:
1/ Qualifications and Experiences
- University graduate in Finance, Accounting major.
- A minimum of 4 years’ business experience preferably in financial within the life insurance industry.
2/ Competencies and specialized knowledge
- Knowledge of local and international accounting standards, taxes, legal & audit issues
- Knowledge of financial statements, regulatory environment and life insurance finance (preferably),
- Strong skills in financial modeling.
- Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.
- Proactively engage and work with related key business partners
- Ability to prioritize tasks and meet established deadlines.
- Detail oriented yet capable of seeing the bigger picture, well organized, self-starter, careful, sense of responsibility.

Title: Project Management Leader cum Executive Assistant
Company: Navigos Search
Location: District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, HCMC
Job Description:
Project Management Lead:

- Support Country CEO in implementation and execution of country business strategies, ensuring alignment with organizational goals and priorities.
- Work with Business Leaders to execute the corporate strategy on client planning and helping clients to protect and grow their businesses.
- Lead cross-functional projects from initiation through execution as assigned by the CEO including not limited to act as the primary liaison with the designated agency to coordinate and execute local training initiatives
- Measure project performance using appropriate tools and techniques in order to monitor the progress of the project, identify and quantify any variances, perform any required corrective actions, and communicate the information broadly. Ensure a common understanding by setting expectations in accordance with the Project Plan, to align the collaborators and team members.
- Work with responsible management to develop a fact base for BU Leaders. This requires macro-economic research and understanding on the markets, business performance, business competitive positions, business model, structure & people.
- Track and monitor strategic activities/initiatives to ensure goals and benchmarks are achieved. Facilitate reporting and measurement ensuring a timely flow of key performance data and information for stakeholders across the enterprise.
- Prepare executive-level presentations, reports, and dashboards for internal and external stakeholders.
- Research, coordinate, and consolidate business data to support the Country CEO in preparing reports and presentations for business partners.
- Assist in drafting and disseminating key communications on behalf of the Country CEO, maintaining a high level of professionalism and confidentiality.
- Other tasks as assigned.

Executive Assistance to Executive Committee (ExCom):

- Serve as a trusted advisor and operational partner to the ExCom, ensuring seamless coordination and communication
- Manage ExCom meeting logistics, including agenda setting, minutes, and follow-up actions.
- Act as a liaison between the ExCom and internal/external stakeholders, maintaining discretion and professionalism
- Support ExCom with calendar management, travel arrangements, and expense reporting
- Draft high-level communications, briefing notes, and confidential documents on behalf of the CEO and ExCom
- Other tasks as assigned
Job Requirements:
- Bachelor’s degree in business administration, Management, or related field (Master’s preferred).
- Minimum 5 years of experience in project management, executive assistance to ExCom, or strategic operations.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills
- Outstanding organizational, analytical, time management and communication skills.
- Proven ability to manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment.
- High level of integrity and discretion in handling confidential information.
- Proficiency in project management tools and Microsoft Office Suite.
- PMP or CAPM Certification

Title: Key Account Manager (On-Premise, Horeca)
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Sữa Việt Nam (Vinamilk)
Location: Vinamilk Tower - No. 10 Tan Trao, Tan Phu Ward, District 7, Số 10, Tân Trào, P. Tân Phú, Q.7, Tp. HCM
Job Description:
ABOUT THE ROLE:
Key Account Manager is responsible for leading all business and multifunctional processes at Distributor’s branches level via demonstrating stewardship behavior. This is achieved personally, and through the management of people that delivers superior retail presence on & offline and superior consumer & customer value in line with Vinamilk’s Purpose Values & Principles.

JOB DESCRIPTION:
- Primary responsibility entails overseeing the implementation at lower levels and monitoring the execution of detailed action plans and sales activities aimed at achieving the overall objectives assigned for the Key Account Chain: (revenue, costs, coverage, distribution, image, market share...).
- Consolidate tender information and execute support tasks related to the entire tendering process/procurement preparation for Key Account Chain and Key Account Chain (liaise with documentation procedures, provide training assistance, consulting, task resolution, etc.) to achieve overall business outcomes.
- Formulate appropriate policies and programs related to the penetration and development of Vinamilk products into various retail points.
- Plan and evaluate the execution/access/care/exploitation efforts of staff within the month concerning the target customer list (transferred Key Account Chain, designated Key Account Chain potential customers, retail points with or without previous company product purchases...).
- Identify and assess new business opportunities (potential to open new retail points, increase SKU/retail points, increase inventory reserves for retail points...) to exploit optimal sales opportunities from customers.
- Supervise the execution, implementation, and management of customer contracts.
- Organize deployment and oversee the execution of trade marketing programs, sales support activities, and commercial promotion efforts (such as promotions, displays, product launches, communication activities...) targeted at Key Account Chain to ensure accuracy and effectiveness.
- Maintaining and enhancing service quality and providing the best customer care, fostering strong relationships with Key Account Chain customers and Distributors within the customer's geographical area.
- Take responsibility for the management, monitoring, control, and evaluation of the utilization of resources related to sales and Key Account Chain (operational budget, personnel, assets, support activities...) efficiently and in compliance with regulations.
Job Requirements:
EDUCATION AND PROFESSION:
• Bachelor Degree.
• Priority is given to majors in Marketing, Business Administration, International Business, Foreign Economics, Foreign Trade or related Economics majors.

EXPERIENCE:
• At least 10 years of sales experience, sales management for Key Account, Horeca customer groups;
• At least 2-3 years as Manager Level in multinational companies/large-scale consumer goods or fast-moving consumer goods (FMCG) industries.

PROFESSIONAL KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS:
• Have good knowledge of sales in the field of food/fast-moving consumer goods, especially knowledge and understanding of special customer channels (Key Account/Anchor Account) and types of direct consumer customers (On-premise).
• Have basic knowledge of marketing and building trade support activities (trade marketing).
• Have knowledge of implementing business strategies.
• Ability to analyze and plan.
• Good skills in negotiation.
• Good communication/presentation/persuasion skills.
Keyword: Công Ty Cổ Phần Sữa Việt Nam (Vinamilk)

Title: Accountant
Company: Công Ty TNHH Giáo Dục Và Đào Tạo Vinacademy
Location: VinUniversity
Job Description:
ABOUT VINUNIVERSITY
VinUniversity (VinUni: https://vinuni.edu.vn/) is the first private, not-for-profit Vietnamese university established based on international standards. The university integrates the models of excellent international universities with the unique cultural and economic characteristics of Vietnam, to make a breakthrough in Vietnamese higher education and to become a world-class university.

The University has built strategic collaborations with Cornell University and the University of Pennsylvania — a choice that speaks to our commitment to excellence, innovation in research and teaching, and to making a difference in the world.

VinUni comprises of College of Arts and Sciences; College of Business and Management; College of Engineering and Computer Science; and College of Health Sciences.

Every aspect of the University: its curricula, research, faculty, student body, facilities, and campus life, is being developed to meet the highest standards set by the world’s leading accrediting and ranking organizations, such as ABET, AACSB, WFME, ACEN, Quacquarelli Symonds (QS) and Times Higher Education (THE).

VinUni’s founding benefactor – Vingroup is one of the biggest private conglomerates in Asia with the largest market capitalization value in Vietnam. As a multisector corporation, Vingroup focuses on three main areas: Industrials & Technology; Real Estate & Services; Social Enterprises. VinUni is proud to be a part of the Vingroup ecosystem, giving its students opportunities to connect with several high quality research institutes (such as VinBigData), pioneering companies (such as VinFast, Vinpearl, Vinmec, Vinschool, and Vinhomes) and an dynamic entrepreneurial ecosystem (such as VinVenture, VinMotion, and VinRobotics…).

In September 2024, VinUni became the youngest and fastest university in the world to achieve QS 5 stars, earning 5 stars in 9 categories: global engagement, good governance, program strength, academic development, teaching, employability, facilities, arts, and social impact. In October 2024, VinUni was appointed by UNESCO as the first and only UNESCO University Chair, focusing on Environmental Leadership, Cultural Heritage, and Biodiversity.

POSITION RESPONSIBILITIES
1. Revenue and Receivables

Calculate and issue fee collection notices.
Issue invoices accurately, ensuring completeness and timeliness in accordance with revenue recognition principles.
Reconcile revenue with actual receipts to ensure accuracy.
Process refunds/deposits (if any) for students.
Manage the collection of student debt, retail customer debt, and internal debt.
Update, monitor, and manage receivables for each customer in a timely manner.
Making the account receivable report.
Report cases of overdue debts promptly and seek management guidance for resolution.
2. Payments and Payables

Verify the validity of payment documents to ensure adherence to legal regulations and internal guidelines.
Provide guidance to relevant departments on payment document procedures.
Proceed payment, both domestically and internationally ensuring timely supplier payments.
Oversight of employee advances, supplier deposits, and accounts payable reconciliation prior to payment processing.
Undertake pre-accruals to ensure comprehensive and timely expense recognition.
3. Assets

Generate asset codes, print asset labels, and distribute to respective departments for proper asset identification.
Review documentation related to the new asset purchase, maintenance, repair and renovation to ensure completeness, reasonableness, and compliance with legal and internal requirements.
Timely and accurately update relevant data regarding assets in the software system following any changes such as acquisitions, disposals, liquidations, transfers of assets, in adherence to regulatory guidelines.
Ensure precise and punctual allocation and depreciation in line with the designated framework for each category or type of assets and recognize with correct CI and cost center.
Organize and execute periodic and unexpected asset count. Compile asset count results with explanations for discrepancies, suggest potential solutions, and seek approval from leadership.
Random check the asset labeling and management practices within relevant departments to confirm assets are appropriately and comprehensively identified.
4. Taxes

Review all taxes, including VAT, PIT, FCT, CIT to ensure full and timely declaration and payment in compliance with regulations.
Provide tax planning and propose tax-saving solutions.
Provide data and explanations to tax authorities and relevant agencies during tax inspections and finalization.
Conduct research on regulations and offer advice to departments as required.
5. General tasks

Perform accurate and timely accounting entries in SAP accounting software, maintaining compliance with accounting standards.
Monitor daily, weekly, and monthly data SAP system.
Organize and maintain document storage in compliance with regulatory standards.
Responsible for providing and explaining information/data related to designated area to departments and to the auditors and other authorities upon request.
Other duties as assigned by the leader.
Job Requirements:
EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE
Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, Banking, Economics, Business management or a related field.

Title: Collections Project Management Expert
Company: FE CREDIT
Location: 144 Đường Cộng Hòa, Phường 12, Quận Tân Bình, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 3B Floor, REE TOWER, 09 Doan Van Bo Street, Ward 13, Dist 4, HCMC
Job Description:
Với vai trò này, bạn sẽ chịu trách nhiệm giám sát và quản lý các dự án quan trọng nhằm cải thiện quy trình và hệ thống xử lý tín dụng. Bạn sẽ làm việc chặt chẽ với các nhóm chức năng để đảm bảo các dự án hoàn thành đúng thời hạn, trong phạm vi và phù hợp với các mục tiêu chiến lược của phòng

------------------------------------

- Lập kế hoạch và thực hiện dự án: Phát triển kế hoạch dự án chi tiết, bao gồm thời gian, mục tiêu, phân bổ nguồn lực và quản trị rủi ro. Đảm bảo các dự án được triển khai hiệu quả và mang lại hiệu suất để đáp ứng các mục tiêu kinh doanh
- Quản lý các bên liên quan: Hợp tác với các bên liên quan nội bộ, bao gồm nhóm quản lý cấp cao, tài chính và vận hành, để thu thập các yêu cầu, cung cấp thông tin cập nhật và giải quyết mọi vấn đề hoặc quan ngại liên quan đến dự án
- Cải tiến quy trình: Xác định cơ hội cải tiến quy trình trong phòng ban xử lý tín dụng. Chủ động thực hiện các sáng kiến để sắp xếp vận hành, nâng cao hiệu quả và cải thiện hiệu suất chung
- Phân tích và báo cáo dữ liệu: Phân tích dữ liệu và số liệu của dự án để đánh giá tiến độ, hiệu suất và kết quả. Chuẩn bị các báo cáo và bài thuyết trình tổng quan để ban quản lý xem xét
- Lãnh đạo đội nhóm: Phối hợp và chủ động thực hiện các nhóm dự án, bao gồm nhóm nội bộ và nhà cung cấp bên ngoài. Cung cấp hướng dẫn, hỗ trợ và tạo động lực để đảm bảo các thành viên trong nhóm thống nhất với các mục tiêu của dự án
- Quản lý ngân sách: Phát triển và quản lý ngân sách dự án, đảm bảo chi phí được kiểm soát và nằm trong hạn mức được phê duyệt. Cung cấp báo cáo tình hình ngân sách thường xuyên cho ban quản lý
- Tuân thủ và Quản trị Rủi ro: Đảm bảo dự án tuân thủ các quy định liên quan, chính sách của công ty và các tiêu chuẩn trong lĩnh vực. Xác định và giảm thiểu các rủi ro tiềm ẩn tác động đến thành công của dự án
- Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác do Quản lý Trực tiếp giao phó
Job Requirements:
§ Tốt nghiệp Đại Học, chuyên ngành IT, Quản Trị Kinh Doanh, Kinh Tế hoặc các ngành liên quan
§ Tối thiểu 3 năm kinh nghiệm mảng Tài Chính (ngân hàng, bảo hiểm, đầu tư,…) hoặc điều phối dự án/tham gia quản lý dự án
§ Kỹ năng phân tích và tư duy logic tốt
§ Thành thạo ứng dụng văn phòng (Microsoft Word, Microsoft Excel, PL/SQL)
§ Kỹ năng tổ chức và lên kế hoạch tốt
§ Kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề tốt
§ Kỹ năng lập báo cáo tốt
§ Lưu loát tiếng Anh và tiếng Việt

Title: Logistics Manager (HCM)
Company: Cardinal Global Logistics (Vietnam) Company Limited
Location: 60 Truong Son, Tan Son Hoa Ward, Ho Chi Minh City, 5th Floor, Hado South Building, 60 Truong Son, Ward 2 , Tan Binh District, Ho Chi Minh City
Job Description:
• Coordinate with suppliers to manage and supervise all customs declaration and clearance activities of the company's import and export goods.
• Coordinate with the sales department to visit customers and advise on optimal logistics solutions according to the requirements of customers and partners.
• Develop a standard logistics service price list and negotiate with suppliers to get the most competitive price for the company.
• Develop, implement and optimize customs procedures to ensure compliance with the law, minimize costs and time.
• Check and approve HS codes, tax rates, customs documents, ensure accuracy and suitability.
• Update, analyze and advise the Board of Directors on customs policies, regulations and import and export taxes.
• Advise relevant departments on customs procedures, update new policies.
• Work and maintain relationships with customs agencies, logistics partners, shipping lines... to handle issues arising.
• Manage and train customs staff, import and export declarations.
• Coordinate with departments to ensure smooth flow of goods.
• Resolve logistics issues arising related to the company's shipments.
Job Requirements:
Job requirements:
• Graduated from university majoring in Customs, Import and Export, Logistics, International Economics or related majors.
• Have at least 10 years of experience in the customs field, of which ≥ 3 years of experience in a management position.
• Understand customs regulations, laws, import and export taxes, priority is given to candidates with customs declaration certificates.
• Management, leadership and team training skills.
• Good communication, negotiation and problem-solving skills.
• Good English (reading and understanding documents, communicating with international partners).

Benefits:
• Competitive salary.
• 13th month salary, holiday/Tet bonus.
• Full insurance according to regulations.
• Opportunity to participate in specialized training courses on customs and logistics.
• Professional working environment, opportunities for promotion to higher positions in the supply chain.

Title: Sales Coordinator
Company: Pacific Partners
Location: 214 Nguyen Van Huong, Thao Dien Ward, Thu Duc City, HCMC, 214 Nguyen Van Huong Street,W. Thao Dien, Thu Duc City, HCMC
Job Description:
JOB OVERVIEW:
The Sales Coordinator is the main point of contact between the company and its customers, ensuring excellent customer service, smooth communication, and efficient support to the Sales Department. This role requires a service-oriented, well-organized, and proactive individual who can handle customer requests, manage sales administration, and coordinate with cross-functional teams to deliver the best customer experience.

RESPONSIBILITIES:
1. Customer Service & Relationship Management
● Act as the first point of contact for customers regarding quotations, samples, purchase orders, and deliveries.
● Provide accurate and timely information to customers, ensuring a high level of satisfaction.
● Handle and resolve customer issues, complaints, or requests in a professional and effective manner.
● Prepare and provide product quality documents, certifications, and any required customer support documentation.
● Build and maintain strong long-term relationships with customers through consistent communication and service excellence.

2. Sales Administration & Coordination
● Organize and maintain sales-related documents (catalogues, product pictures, price lists, samples).
● Support the Sales Director with daily secretarial and administrative tasks.
● Coordinate with other departments (Logistics, Warehouse, Accounting, HR, Marketing) to ensure smooth sales execution.
● Ensure clear communication across departments on customer-related matters.

3. Sales Reporting & Analysis
● Prepare regular and ad-hoc sales reports, including sales staff performance tracking.
● Conduct sales analysis to provide insights into customer demand and sales performance.
● Monitor contract terms and appendices with customers, ensuring updates and adjustments are made on time.
● Set up and maintain customer master data in the company’s information systems (Odoo, MISA).

4. B2B Online Sales Management
● Manage content (product information, images, inventory, pricing) on B2B online platforms.
● Process and fulfill online orders, ensuring timely and accurate delivery.
● Support online customer service inquiries and vendor communications.
● Implement on-site marketing activities and promotions.
● Track B2B sales KPIs and prepare performance reports
Job Requirements:
Education & Experience:
● Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Sales, Marketing, or related fields.
● 1–2 years of experience in customer service, sales coordination, or account management (experience in B2B/e-commerce is a plus).

Skills & Qualities:
● Strong customer service mindset with excellent communication and problem-solving skills.
● Well-organized, detail-oriented, and proactive in handling multiple tasks.
● Proficiency in MS Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Word); experience with ERP systems (Odoo, MISA) is an advantage.
● Analytical and reporting skills.
● Team player with strong coordination abilities.
● Good English proficiency is a plus.

RECRUITMENT PROCESS:
2 interview rounds: First with Sales Director + HR, Round 2: CEO

COMPENSATION & BENEFITS:
Income & Rewards:
● Competitive salary based on experience and qualifications.
● 13th-month salary and performance-based incentives.
Working Conditions:
● Social, health, and unemployment insurance as per government regulations.
● Professional growth opportunities, including mentoring and skill development.
● Dynamic and collaborative work environment with career advancement potential.

Working hours:
● Monday – Friday: 08:30 - 17:30
● Saturday Morning: 08:30 - 12:00 (1-hour lunch break)

HOW TO APPLY
Please send your CV via email with the subject [Position] - [Full Name].
(Only successful CVs will be contacted for interviews).

Title: IT Support Specialist (Fluent in English) – Fresher and Pre-Graduate Welcome – Salary from 19M
Company: ITECHWX COMPANY LIMITED
Location: 1st Floor, S4-01 Tower, The Sun Avenue Building, No. 28 Mai Chi Tho Street, An Phu Ward, Thu Duc City, 12th Floor, Opal Tower 92 Nguyen Huu Canh Street, Ward 22, Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh city, Vietnam
Job Description:
What is Azure A&I?
Azure A&I (Apps & Infrastructure) is the core team behind Microsoft Azure’s foundational cloud services. It focuses on building and managing virtual machines, containers, and hybrid cloud solutions to help customers run applications, manage infrastructure, and improve performance securely and at scale. The team also drives innovation in cloud-native technologies and supports global operations through scalable, reliable systems.

Key Components
• Virtual Machines (VMs) – Provision, configure, and manage scalable computer resources for cloud workloads.
• Containers & Kubernetes – Build and orchestrate containerized applications using Kubernetes and open-source tools.
• Hybrid Cloud Solutions – Design and support infrastructure that integrates on-premises systems with Azure cloud services.
• IaaS Storage – Implement and optimize storage solutions for high-performance, secure data access across virtual environments.
• AI Infrastructure – Enable intelligent applications through Azure OpenAI, Machine Learning, and scalable AI platforms.
Who Uses It?
• Cloud engineers use Azure A&I to build and manage core infrastructure like virtual machines and containers.
• IT administrators rely on Azure A&I to maintain secure, scalable, and connected environments across hybrid cloud setups.
• Developers leverage Azure A&I services to deploy applications and integrate with modern DevOps workflows.

YOU WILL:
• Manage support tickets by reviewing customer issues, initiating contact to understand concerns, and keeping customers informed throughout the resolution process.
• Use provided tools and applications—such as diagnostic utilities, system logs, performance monitors, and proprietary platforms—to investigate and troubleshoot technical problems effectively.
• Resolve or escalate a variety of customer issues, document technical work and research promptly, and maintain accurate case records for transparency and knowledge sharing.
• Collaborate across teams and products to address moderately complex technical issues, leveraging cross-functional expertise to ensure thorough resolution.
• Participate in technical and non-technical training sessions to build proficiency in support topics and stay current with evolving tools and processes.
• Contribute to continuous improvement by identifying inefficiencies, suggesting enhancements to automated tools, and providing feedback on product and process improvements.
• Assist in post-incident reviews and root cause analysis to prevent recurrence as part of incident management participation.
• Create or update internal and external documentation to support customers and peers in resolving issues more efficiently.
• Other relevant tasks assigned by the management.
Job Requirements:
OUR IDEAL CANDIDATES:
Must Have:
• English Proficiency: Demonstrated fluency across all four language skills—listening, speaking, reading, and writing—with a proficiency level equivalent to IELTS Speaking 6.5+. Clear and effective communication in English is essential for both internal collaboration and client interactions.
• Technical Background: A solid foundation in IT or programming is required. This role involves working with technical systems and tools, so prior education or experience in a related field is essential.
• Work Schedule Flexibility: Willingness to work in rotating shifts, including night shifts, is required to support global operations and ensure 24/7 service coverage.
• Work Hours: This is a full-time position with a 5-day work week and 2 non-fixed days off. Each workday consists of 9 hours (8 hours of work and 1 hour for breaks).

Nice To Have:
• Customer Focus: A strong customer service orientation is a must, along with a results-driven mindset. Candidates with experience supporting international clients will be given preference, as this role often involves cross-cultural communication and service delivery.

WHY US?
• Salary ranges (Gross): from 19,000,000 VND
• Salary at 100% during the probationary period
• 90% contribution of the gross salary to social insurance
• An employee who works at night (10PM -6 AM) will be paid an additional amount of 30% of the normal salary + PVI insurance + 500,000 VND food allowance
• 20 days leave (12 days of annual leave and 8 days of sick leave)
• Training will be offered
• Full working equipment will be provided Annual Health Checkup
• Activities: Birthday party, Employee engagement activities.

OTHERS:
• Working location: 1st Floor, S4-01 Tower, The Sun Avenue Building, No. 28 Mai Chi Tho Street, An Phu Ward, Thu Duc City
• Working time: Rotation Shift, including: 5 days a week, 9 hours per day, including 8 working hours and 1 hour for rest

Title: Process Engineer (IL6S Engineer)
Company: Mondelēz Kinh Đô Việt Nam
Location: Lộ 5, TT Bần Yên Nhân - Mỹ Hào, Hưng Yên, 8th Floor, Empress Tower, 138-142 Hai Ba Trung Street, Sai Gon Ward, HCMC
Job Description:
Main responsibilities:
• Driving the IL6S (Integrated Lean Six Sigma) implementation and continuous improvement activity on the line through FI, WPI, AM, PM pillar, Planning and warehouse management implementation.
• Learning the technology of the line and become proficient with operating the line.
• Identifying losses and prioritize the actions to eliminate the losses.
• Be able to conduct the root cause analysis and breakdown management.
• Build the capability of the operator through training and qualification.
• Be Line level systems owner, is part of the site’s pillars team and owns site level systems for these pillars.
• Working with line organization on the daily management system and 24 hours direction setting.
Job Requirements:
Requirements
• English proficiency for skills: This is essential for effective communication with international colleagues and partners.
• Educational Qualification: Bachelor’s Degree in Technical Engineering (Mechanical, Chemical, Industrial, Electrical or Food Science/Technology)
• At least 1-2 years of Experience in continuous improvement positions such as operational excellence, manufacturing excellence, process engineer. Prefer IL6S roles.
• Identify & eliminate production losses.
• Have strong knowledge on root cause analysis & breakdown management methodologies.
Key Skill & competencies:
• Process & Packaging technology: Learned on the job with the help of the engineering academic background, should learn how to operate the equipment independently and gets proficient to teach, created new standards and implement them.
• Engineering. Apply technical engineering skills (Mechanical, Chemical, Industrial, or Electrical) to do practical problem solving and loss elimination.
• Consumer & Customer Focus. Help the line managers and the organization on the floor to deliver the daily agenda on the line, delivering the right quality and eliminating all kinds of waste in the operations.
• Bias for Action. Provides consistent and near real time information, decisions can be taken quickly in the daily management system and 24hrs direction setting meeting.
• Building Talent & Teams. The site vision is to move to line-aligned structured & 6star setup, and we require IL6S Engineer’s with a passion for achieving results through great teamwork, an ability to teach new tools and methodologies.
• Accountability & Responsibility. Taking responsibility for building team’s performance and sharing your best interventions to help support other lines in their improvements.
• IL6S. Apply the full set of IL6S methods and tools to identify root causes, define countermeasures and validate their effectiveness; mastery of AM, PM, FI, QC and Logistics methods and tools. Establish standards to support line operators sustain new basic conditions.
• Analytical capability. Collect and analyse complex data to penetrate problems’ phenomena and understand root causes.

Title: Junior Project Coordinator (Retail Fashion, US Market)
Company: Crossian Việt Nam
Location: Tầng 1, Toà nhà Pax Sky, 63 - 65 phố Ngô Thì Nhậm, Phường Phạm Đình Hổ, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, Hà Nội, Tầng 1, Pax Sky, 63-65 Ngô Thì Nhậm, Phường Phạm Đình Hổ, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, TP Hà Nội, Việt Nam
Job Description:
ABOUT THE ROLE
Crossian is a high-growth technology-driven e-commerce business. Behind our success is our people. As a start-up formed in 2020, we have created a fast-paced and dynamic environment, enabling our people to reach a cumulative average growth rate of over 1000% in just 3 years. Our mission now is to build direct-to-consumer brands and increase customer lifetime value.
We’re currently seeking a detail-oriented and highly motivated Junior Project Coordinator with a strong interest in retail fashion and project management to join our US Market Product Development team.
In this role, you will work closely with Product Managers and creative teams to support Agile processes, team coordination, and cross-functional communication. You will assist in organizing workflows, tracking timelines, and maintaining project documentation to ensure milestones are delivered on schedule.
Prior experience in the fashion industry is not required. What matters is your ability to learn quickly, adapt to a fast-paced environment, and collaborate effectively with diverse teams. You will also interact with cross-functional stakeholders and external partners, helping ensure smooth execution of projects from start to finish.

WHAT YOU WILL DO
As Junior Project Coordinator, you will be at the center of daily project activities. Your work will directly support the team’s ability to deliver on time and at high quality.
Team Coordination & Agile Process
• Support Product Managers in key Agile ceremonies including sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives
• Organize and document team meetings with clear agendas, notes, and follow-up actions
• Facilitate smooth collaboration across Product Managers, Designers, and other stakeholders
• Assist with day-to-day operations to keep workflows structured and efficient
Timeline & Risk Monitoring
• Assist in building and updating project timelines with clear milestones
• Monitor progress against deadlines and highlight risks early
• Support contingency planning with Product Managers and team leads
Stakeholder Management
• Coordinate with cross-functional teams such as Supply Chain, Content, and Creative
• Support onboarding and collaboration with vendors, freelancers, and other external partners
• Track deliverables and proactively address issues to maintain alignment
Documentation & Reporting
• Maintain project-related documents and knowledge repositories
• Prepare progress reports and distribute timely updates to stakeholders
• Act as a point of contact for project-related inquiries
Feedback & Continuous Improvement
• Collect and categorize feedback from teams and partners
• Share insights with stakeholders and turn them into actionable improvements
• Contribute to refining workflows and enhancing team effectiveness
Job Requirements:
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR
Educational Background
• Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Economics, or related fields.
Work Experience
• 1-2 years of experience in project coordination or similar roles within a fast-paced environment
• Fresh graduates with strong motivation and organizational skills are also encouraged to apply
• Some exposure to Agile or cross-functional projects is an advantage
Technical Skills
• Familiarity with project management tools (Asana, Jira, Confluence, or similar).
• Strong organizational skills with the ability to manage tasks, track progress, and ensure follow-up.
• Basic analytical ability to interpret project data and prepare reports.
Soft Skills
• Strong communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to keep stakeholders aligned.
• Good facilitation skills for meetings, including agenda preparation, note-taking, and follow-up.
• Detail-oriented, proactive, and able to spot potential risks early.
• Open-minded, eager to learn, adaptable to new challenges, and comfortable working with diverse teams.
Additional Requirements
• A genuine interest in the fashion industry, especially retail and consumer products.
• Proficiency in English (IELTS 7.0+ or equivalent), with confidence in working directly with international teammates.

WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT
At Crossian, our people are the key to our success. We believe in creating an attractive total compensation package that not only retains employees but allows them to excel in their profession. These include:
• Competitive salary (negotiable, up to 30 months of total compensation per year)
• Full salary during probation period.
• Young, dynamic, transparent and open-minded working culture. All ideas are welcome!
• Guaranteed 13th month salary.
• Year-end bonus as part of our profit sharing program.
• 12 days work-from-home & 12 days of paid annual leave.
• Global health insurance package for yourself and direct family members, plus annual health check-ups.
• A Pantry, a Game Room, a Library & a Crossian Cafe stocked with goodies, always ready to serve.
• Lots of other company benefits including a 5-star annual company trip, budget for frequent team building activities and other monthly / quarterly / annual company events.
• General company Learning and Development (L&D) Program + dedicated L&D budget for leads & managers.

Title: Influencer Marketing Manager - FMCG/Cosmetics
Company: Navigos Search
Location: HCMC Office, HCMC
Job Description:
A Mục Tiêu Chính Của Vị Trí
• Xây dựng & triển khai chiến lược Influencer / KOL / KOC phù hợp với định vị thương hiệu beauty / retail
• Phát triển mạng lưới influencer & đối tác KOL / KOC chất lượng
• Thiết lập KPI & đo lường hiệu quả các chiến dịch influencer để tối ưu ngân sách & ROI
• Tạo sự đồng bộ giữa influencer marketing & các chiến lược branding / performance tổng thể
B Trách Nhiệm Chính
1. Chiến lược & Planning
• Xây dựng chiến lược Influencer / KOL / KOC phù hợp với từng chiến dịch
• Lập budget & phân bổ chi phí influencer theo từng chiến dịch
• Nghiên cứu xu hướng influencer & định hướng hợp tác mới
2. Xây dựng & quản lý mạng lưới
• Phát triển mối quan hệ với các KOL, KOC, influencer (trong và ngoài ngành)
• Xây dựng data base, hợp đồng hợp tác, quy trình làm việc rõ ràng
• Duy trì quan hệ với influencer để hợp tác dài hạn
3. Triển khai chiến dịch
• Làm việc với influencer / KOL/KOC để phát triển nội dung (caption, nội dung video, hình ảnh)
• Quản lý tiến độ sản xuất, gửi sample, kiểm duyệt nội dung
• Kết hợp cùng đội content/creative/ads để làm việc
• Giám sát việc posting, đăng tải, hợp tác theo kế hoạch
4. Đánh giá & tối ưu
• Thiết lập hệ thống đo lường (reach, impressions, engagement, chuyển đổi, traffic, sales attributed)
• Phân tích hiệu quả chiến dịch, rút insight để tối ưu chiến lược
• Theo dõi ROI/investment vs kết quả đạt được
• Báo cáo định kỳ (tuần, tháng, quý) về hiệu quả influencer
5. Quản lý & phối hợp nội bộ
• Làm việc với Content/Design/Marketing/Editor/ Digital Marekting
• Hỗ trợ các chiến dịch multi-channel, đồng bộ hóa thông điệp
• Phối hợp với khp để gửi sản phẩm cho influencer
• Làm việc với agency, bên thứ ba nếu cần
6. Cải tiến & đổi mới
• Cập nhật xu hướng influencer mới
• Thử nghiệm hình thức hợp tác mới: livestream, affiliate, UGC, collagen với influencers
• Đề xuất cơ chế hợp tác sáng tạo (video thử thách, brand challenge, viral content, mini games)
Job Requirements:
A. Học vấn & Kinh nghiệm
• Tốt nghiệp Đại học chuyên ngành Marketing, Truyền thông, Quảng cáo hoặc tương đương
• ≥ 4-6 năm trong influencer marketing / KOL / KOC / hợp tác người ảnh hưởng, ưu tiên ngành beauty / retail / lifestyle
B. Quan hệ & network
• Có mạng lưới rộng với KOL / influencer / KOC trong ngành làm đẹp / lifestyle
• Có khả năng “săn” influencer mới
• Kỹ năng phân tích dữ liệu & trích insight Understanding về SEO/SEM, email marketing là lợi thế
C. Kỹ năng đánh giá & phân tích
• Thành thạo đo lường hiệu quả influencer (ER, engagement, traffic, sales attribution)
• Phân tích và rút insight từ dữ liệu chiến dịch
• Hiểu các nền tảng social media & thuật toán (TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, YouTube…)
D. Kỹ năng quản lý & giao tiếp
• Kỹ năng đàm phán hợp đồng, chi phí/kpi với influencer
• Quản lý quá trình sản xuất nội dung, KPI, timeline
• Kỹ năng làm việc với đa bên (influencer, agency, nội bộ)
E. Tư duy & phẩm chất cá nhân
• Sáng tạo, tinh thần thử nghiệm
• Chủ động, linh hoạt, chịu áp lực tốt
• Tinh thần hợp tác & giao tiếp tốt
• Cẩn trọng, chi tiết trong quản lý hợp đồng & quyền lợi

Job Description:
POSITION SUMMARY
The Import Documentation Manager is responsible for ensuring compliance with inbound shipment documentation with MSC’s internal procedures and local regulations. This role focuses on leading the Import Documentation team, supporting customer and partner needs, and managing risks and costs related to import.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
1. Documentation Compliance:
• Ensure all inbound shipment documentation complies with MSC’s internal procedures and local authority regulations.
• Keep relevant departments informed of changes in inbound procedures.
• Coordinate with overseas agencies for COD and re-export shipments to/from/via Vietnam.

2. Customer Service:
• Maintain MSC’s service standards through ongoing review and enhancement.
• Handle escalating customer issues and provide tailored solutions for VIP clients.

3. Cost Control:
• Review manifests to identify routing errors and booking risks.
• Verify port storage, plug, and vendor invoices related to import cargo.

4. Analysis & Reporting:
• Nominate cargo flow to terminals based on shipment priority and operational constraints.
• Analyze service performance to support cost-saving and sales efforts.
• Prepare regular and ad-hoc reports for management, overseas agencies, and Geneva.

5. Team Leadership & Process Optimization:
• Lead and assign tasks within the team to meet operational deadlines and KPIs.
• Improve work processes to enhance accuracy, reduce manual tasks, and maintain flexibility.
• Coach and develop team members to ensure performance and continuous improvement.

6. Other Assignments:
Perform other tasks and projects as assigned by management.
Job Requirements:
KEY EXPERIENCE & QUALIFICATIONS
• Bachelor’s degree.
• Minimum of 3 years of experience in a similar position.

KEY COMPETENCIES & SKILLS
• Fluent in English (written and spoken).
• Strong leadership and people management skills.
• Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.
• Proficient in MS Office.
• Customer-oriented with a proactive and solution-driven mindset.
• Strong organizational and problem-solving capabilities.

• Xây dựng/thiết lập/cập nhật và thực hiện các chính sách theo quy định của pháp luật trong hoạt động quản lý.
• Trực tiếp quản lý, phân công công việc, điều hành hoạt động của CBNV tại đơn vị. Xây dựng đội ngũ làm việc hiệu quả và chuyên nghiệp.
• Báo cáo, đề xuất, xin ý kiến Tổng quản lý/Giám đốc Công ty các vấn đề liên quan đến nhân sự: tuyển dụng/thay thế lao động; khen thưởng/kỷ luật; lương và các chế độ liên quan.
• Chịu trách nhiệm trước Tổng quản lý/Giám đốc Công ty về hoạt động của đơn vị.

Job Requirements:

• Có ít nhất 3 năm kinh nghiệm quản lý tòa nhà hoặc kinh nghiệm quản trị hệ thống kỹ thuật tòa nhà.

Quyền Lợi

• Môi trường làm việc năng động, thường xuyên được tham gia các khóa đào tạo để nâng cao trình độ và các kỹ năng.

Title: AML Senior Specialist
Company: Cathay United Bank
Location: Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, Taipei, Taiwan
Job Description:
Main tasks:
**Irregularly:
• Set up AML/CFT educational training to newcomers/as ad-hoc requirement
• Perform gap analysis of AML/CFT regulations/policies; maintain AML manuals/ Policies/ SOPs/ Forms
• Review Suspicious Activity Monitoring (SAM) alerts and Report Suspicious; Review High risk (HRC), Periodical Review (PRE) alerts, name check as required
• Review/update managed list in AML system as per HO and SBV requirements
• Handle issues/ concerns relating to AML system and Core banking such as parameter, system error or testing arrangement etc.; suggest to enhance the AML procedures and system
• Advise the AML/CFT issues/ concerns to other departments and HO
• Other jobs as assigned by Managers and HO
**Daily:
• Manage the closing alerts status in AML system and keep track with Operation for closing alerts
**Monthly:
• Set up AML/CFT educational training materials as annual training program
• Prepare AML/CFT report to HO AML
• Update to HO the List of PEP and Blacklist
**Yearly:
• Prepare relevant AML/CFT reports to SBV
• Perform AML modules testing/tuning as required by HO and internal policy
• Perform EWRA questionnaire and report to HO
• Perform AML/CFT KYC review and report to HO
• Provide documents/ report for HO’s AML testing
• Set up AML/CFT annual training program and ensure training hours to be compliant with HO’s requirements
Job Requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in law (preferred), finance, business management, or a related field
• 5+ years’ proven experience in an AML role
• Familiar with the regulations of AML and banking operation
• Proficient in Vietnamese and English (a must). Priority: proficient in Chinese
• ACAMS (preferred)

Title: Senior Software Engineer (100%)
Company: cyon AG
Location: Switzerland
Job Description:
Your Mission with Us

• You will be part of the development team, supporting internal and external projects
• You ensure that functional and technical requirements are met and that our solutions excel in terms of performance, quality, and security.
• You accompany the entire software lifecycle and ensure sustainable stability through clean code, meaningful tests, and clear documentation.
• You bring experience in maintaining and developing complex legacy systems and actively support migration to modern architectures.
• With modern development and architectural approaches as well as the right tools, you bring structure, transparency, and efficiency to our software projects.
• Through code reviews, pair programming, and close collaboration with the team, you promote knowledge transfer and ensure that best practices are lived.
Job Requirements:
• Completed degree (University of Applied Sciences/University) in Computer Science
• multiple years of experience in PHP development and possible experiences with Zend Framework
• Confident handling of relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and complex SQL queries
• Practical experience in designing and implementing RESTful APIs and integrating third-party APIs, data sources, and external services
• Optimization of performance, security, and user experience
• Professional knowledge in JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, and CSS3
• Understanding of Responsive Design
• Proficient in using Git and established branching strategies
• Experience with agile development methods (Scrum, Kanban)
• Strong analytical skills and structured problem-solving approaches
• Excellent communication skills in English
• Initiative and the ability to work independently in software projects
• Very good English skills

Title: Phó Phòng Đầu Tư

Job Description:
1. Lập, thẩm định và phê duyệt hiệu quả đầu tư dự án
Phân tích đánh giá hiệu quả đầu tư dự án thực tế, đề xuất các phương án kinh doanh hiệu quả (FS)
Tham gia hỗ trợ lập các nội dung trong báo cáo sơ bộ, báo cáo nghiên cứu tiền khả thi/khả thi và quản lý/thẩm định/đánh giá tư vấn thực hiện Báo cáo nghiên cứu tiền khả thi/khả thi
2. Nghiên cứu thị trường
Nghiên cứu, phân tích thông tin về thị trường
Chủ động tìm hiểu, nghiên cứu, đề xuất các lĩnh vực đầu tư mới, các phương án đầu tư, các phương án hợp tác phát triển dự án, các phương án hợp tác kinh doanh; tham gia đàm phán các điều kiện đầu tư/ hợp tác
3. Quản trị mối quan hệ
Chủ động khai thác và duy trì các mối quan hệ với các đối tác, nhà đầu tư tiềm năng
Xây dựng và duy trì các mối quan hệ với các cơ quan chức năng để phê duyệt các thủ tục pháp lý chuẩn bị đầu tư dự án (nếu có là một lợi thế)
4. Lưu trữ và bảo mật thông tin
Lưu trữ hồ sơ phát triển dự án, hồ sơ chuẩn bị đầu tư dự án, và các văn bản, tài liệu, giấy tờ liên quan
Quản lý toàn bộ các tài liệu, báo cáo, hồ sơ được lưu trữ trên hệ thống
Job Requirements:
1. Trình độ: Tốt nghiệp đại học chuyên ngành Quản trị kinh doanh, Kinh tế, Kế hoạch, Tài chính hoặc lĩnh vực liên quan.
2. Kinh nghiệm: 1-3 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực lập kế hoạch hoặc quản lý kế hoạch tại các doanh nghiệp lớn hoặc tập đoàn BĐS. Ưu tiên các ứng viên có kinh nghiệm làm tại Big4.
3. Ngoại ngữ: Tiếng anh ưu tiên
4. Tin học: Sử dụng thành thạo các phần mềm văn phòng (Excel, Word, PowerPoint)
5. Các yêu cầu khác:
Có khả năng làm việc độc lập, chịu áp lực công việc và chủ động trong xử lý công việc.

Title: Marketing Executive
Company: Slimcase
Location: 8-10 Tạ Hiện, Phường Thạnh Mỹ Lợi, Tp. Thủ Đức, Thành phố Thủ Đức, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
Job Description:
New Launch Campaign Execution
Take launching brief & materials and ensure proper campaign execution at the local level.
Ensure new launch campaigns are launched on time as aligned.
Ensure all global guidelines are executed properly.
Propose and manage local communication plan for new product launches.
Prepare marketing materials, website content, product descriptions, promotions, and social media posts.
Ensure cultural and language relevance across all communication channels.

Channels Execution
Prepare ideas, content, and visual briefs for each local channel based on social channel strategy (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, etc., based on local preferences).
Prepare product and promotion content for sale channels: website, e-commerce, and ads-related content.
Work with designers/production house to turn ideas into compelling visual outcomes.
Manage and report performance of all responsible channels.

KOL Management
Identify, evaluate, and engage KOLs/influencers who align with Slimcase’s brand image and target audience.
Develop and share creative briefs to ensure content consistency with brand positioning.
Oversee and track content performance (video/posts), providing reports and optimization recommendations when needed.

Benefits:
Competitive salary based on experience and skills.
Opportunity to work in a fast-growing lifestyle brand with young, dynamic culture.
Exposure to both global marketing strategies and local market execution.
Professional development and growth opportunities in brand & marketing management.
Discounts on Slimcase products.
A fun, creative, and collaborative working environment.
Job Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or related field.
2+ years of experience in marketing, content, or brand operations (FMCG, fashion, or lifestyle brands preferred).
Hands-on experience with social media platforms (Facebook, TikTok, Instagram).
Familiarity with e-commerce content management and digital advertising is a plus.
Excellent communication, project management, and multitasking abilities.
Creative, detail-oriented, and able to work in a fast-paced environment.
Experience working with KOLs is a big plus.

Title: Digital Marketing Manager - FMCG/Cosmetics
Company: Navigos Search
Location: HCMC Office, HCMC
Job Description:
MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC:
A
Mục Tiêu Chính Của Vị Trí
• Xây dựng và triển khai chiến lược Digital Marketing toàn diện, cân bằng giữa performance (quảng cáo, chuyển đổi) và Branding (tương tác, độ nhận diện)
• Phân tích dữ liệu chi tiết, đo lường KPI & ROI để tối ưu hóa ngân sách quảng cáo
• Điều phối đa kênh (Tiktok, Shopee, Facebook, Instagram, Website,..) để đạt mục tiêu doanh thu và thị phần
• Quản lý và phát triển đội ngũ, phối hợp chặt chẽ với các bộ phận Content/ Design/ Sale/ Ecommerce
B
Trách Nhiệm Chính
1. Chiến lược & Planning
• Xây dựng kế hoạch Digital & Performance + Branding hàng năm/quý/tháng
• Thiết lập ngân sách quảng cáo & phân bổ across kênh
• Nghiên cứu thị trường, đối thủ & khách hàng mục tiêu để định hướng chiến dịch.
2. Performance Marketing
• Quản lý & tối ưu hóa chiến dịch quảng cáo (Facebook Ads, Instagram Ads, TikTok Ads, Google Ads)
• Thiết lập, theo dõi & cải thiện các chỉ số: ROAS, CPA, CTR, CR, CAC - A/B testing creative, audience, placement, landing page
• Quản lý quảng cáo trên sàn (Shopee, TikTok Shop…), tối ưu hóa chương trình Flash Sale, ưu đãi
• Liên tục tối ưu CPA & ngân sách để đạt hiệu quả cao
3. Branding & Content / Social
• Xây dựng chiến lược nội dung & branding phù hợp với định vị beauty
• Chỉ đạo nội dung (hình ảnh, video, KOLs/Influencer, UGC) cho TikTok, Facebook, Instagram
• Tăng tương tác, reach, brand awareness, growth viral - Đo lường brand metrics (impression, engagement, sentiment)
4. Phân tích & Báo cáo
• Thiết lập hệ thống tracking & đo lường (pixel, UTM, GA4, hệ thống nội bộ)
• Báo cáo hàng tuần/tháng/quý: KPIs, insights, đề xuất điều chỉnh
• Phân tích funnel, customer journey, performance của từng kênh
• Phát hiện & xử lý bất thường (ads deviance, traffic spike, click fraud)
5. Quản lý & phối hợp nội bộ
• Phối hợp với team Design, Content, E-commerce, Sale
• Đào tạo nhân viên, chia sẻ kiến thức digital & data-driven
• Liên hệ đối tác, agency (nếu có)
6. Cải tiến & đổi mới
• Cập nhật xu hướng digital mới, công cụ quảng cáo mới
• Thử nghiệm công nghệ mới (AI, automation, creative tools)
• Đề xuất giải pháp đổi mới để nâng cao hiệu quả - Xây dựng quy trình & hệ thống tối ưu hoá liên tục
Job Requirements:
A
Học vấn & Kinh nghiệm
• Tốt nghiệp Đại học chuyên ngành Marketing, Digital, Kinh tế, hoặc liên quan. Bằng cao hơn (MBA, MKT chuyên sâu) là điểm cộng
• ≥ 5–7 năm trong digital marketing / performance marketing, trong ngành retail / beauty / e-commerce
B
Kỹ năng chuyên môn
• Thành thạo quảng cáo Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, Google Quảng cáo sàn (Shopee,TikTok Shop…)
• Sử dụng công cụ phân tích & tracking (Google Analytics / GA4, Excel nâng cao, BI tools như Power BI / Looker / Tableau Kỹ năng A/B testing & tối ưu hóa campaign
• Kỹ năng phân tích dữ liệu & trích insight Understanding về SEO/SEM, email marketing là lợi thế
C
Khả năng quản lý & lãnh đạo
• Kỹ năng training, coaching, truyền đạt
• Kỹ năng quản lý dự án & phối hợp đa phòng ban
D
Tư duy & phẩm chất cá nhân
• Data-driven, tư duy phân tích, chi tiết Kỹ năng lập kế hoạch & tổ chức tốt Sáng tạo, khả năng đổi mới
• Chủ động, chịu áp lực cao

Title: Assistant Manager, Civil & Structural Engineering (Based in Hanoi)
Company: Sembcorp Development Vietnam Company Limited
Location: Dong Da, Ha Noi, Vietnam, Vietnam Country Office: Horison Tower, 40 Cat Linh Street, Dong Da District, Hanoi
Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced Civil & Structural Engineer to lead and oversee the execution of industrial construction projects across Vietnam. This role is part of our Vietnam Design & Management (D&M) team and primarily involves managing the planning and design phases of construction works. The successful candidate will coordinate internal and external stakeholders to ensure projects are delivered on time, within budget, and will assist the site team in ensuring compliance with Health, Safety, Security, and Environment (HSSE) standards and quality requirements.

Key Responsibilities

Design & planning
• Conduct site visit to the potential sites as and when is required and provide preliminary civil and structural engineering assessments, including findings and recommendations.
• Collaborate with architects and engineers to review technical drawings and specifications.
• Conduct design reviews and provide feedback on civil and structural engineering solutions.
• Support the pre-qualification of contractors and consultants.
• Assist in tender preparation documents and participate in the technical tender evaluation process.

Project management & monitoring
• Lead day-to-day project management for RBH/RBF and industrial construction projects to ensure timely, on-budget, and high-quality delivery.
• Oversee all on-site technical and engineering matters, including the review of all civil and structural (C&S) submissions from contractors and construction consultants, as well as supporting authority submissions when required.
• Monitor overall site progress for all the construction projects, perform adhoc inspections to ensure full compliance with quality, safety, and contractual requirements.
• Identify, recommend, and implement solutions for issues related to civil and structural works.
• Assist site team on preparing the regular project updates, including monthly progress reports.

Review HSSE Management Plan
• Assist the site team in reviewing and ensuring safety management plans comply with company HSSE standards, focusing primarily on QA/QC requirements.
• Support the identification and resolution of safety-related issues during inspections and audits, working collaboratively with the site team.
• Ensure all safety incidents and related documentation are properly recorded and reported in accordance with internal policies and local regulations.

Stakeholder coordination & communication
• Liaise with HQ D&M team, consultants, contractors, and relevant authorities throughout the project lifecycle.
• Facilitate regular coordination meetings with stakeholders to provide updates and resolve issues promptly.

Other Duties
• Maintain comprehensive project documentation including contracts, permits, inspection records, and progress reports.
• Perform other ad hoc duties as assigned by the company.
Job Requirements:
• Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering or related field, with a minimum of 8 years of relevant experience in civil and structural (C&S) design, project management, and on-site construction.
• Strong knowledge of design principles, Codes of Practice, Building and Fire Safety Regulations, and Green Building & Sustainability standards (i.e. LEED)
• Prior experience in designing and supervising Ready-Built Warehouses (RBWs) and Ready-Built Factories (RBFs) is highly advantageous.
• Proficient in project and design management tools, including reporting protocols and documentation processes.
• Skilled in Microsoft Office and AutoCAD. Prior experience in BIM experience is an advantage.
• Holder of a valid Grade 1 Design Practicing Certificate.
• Excellent problem-solving abilities; able to work both independently and as part of a team.
• Demonstrates a positive, responsible, and self-motivated attitude.
• Proficient in both spoken and written English.

- Thực hiện các công việc khác theo yêu cầu của ban lãnh đạo Công ty.

Title: Production Manager
Company: Opus Manufacturing
Location: Long Hậu, Cần Giuộc, Long An, Vietnam, Thuan An, Binh Duong Province, Vĩnh Cửu, Dong Nai, Vietnam, Tòa nhà M Building, Số 9 Đường số 8, Phường Tân Phú,Quận 7, TP HCM
Job Description:
Job Overview

At Opus Manufacturing, we’re passionate about producing top-quality footwear brands across the globe. We provide innovative and reliable manufacturing solutions, delivering footwear that meets the highest standards in design, performance, and quality.

We’re currently looking for a highly skilled and experienced Production Manager to oversee our manufacturing operations. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in production management within the footwear industry and be responsible for ensuring efficient and cost-effective production while maintaining high-quality standards. This role involves managing production teams, optimizing processes, ensuring adherence to timelines, and meeting client specifications.

What You’ll be Doing?

• Plan, organize, and oversee the production schedule to ensure timely delivery of footwear orders.
• Coordinate with cross-functional teams (sales, development, procurement) to ensure production aligns with client demands and project timelines.
• Manage and mentor sub-units including QC/QA, Compliance & Testing and Planning Teams
• Monitor daily production schedules and resolve any bottlenecks or issues that may arise during the manufacturing process.
• Supervise and lead production staff, including operators, supervisors, and support personnel, ensuring they work efficiently and maintain high performance.
• Ensure that all footwear products meet the highest quality standards and client specifications.
• Implement and maintain quality control procedures, monitor product defects, and drive corrective actions when necessary.
• Ensure compliance with industry regulations, safety standards, and company policies related to manufacturing practices.
• Ensure production processes are efficient while maintaining product quality, thereby maximizing profitability.
• Continuously assess and improve production processes and workflows to enhance efficiency, reduce lead times, and optimize resource utilization.
• Implement best practices for production planning, material handling, and inventory management to minimize downtime.
• Analyze production reports and provide actionable insights for operational improvements.
Job Requirements:
What We’re Looking For?

• Bachelor’s degree in Manufacturing, Industrial Engineering, Operations Management, or a related field.
• Minimum of 8-10 years of experience in production management, preferably in the footwear manufacturing industry.
• Proven track record of managing teams, optimizing production workflows, and improving operational efficiency.
• Strong leadership and team management abilities, with the capacity to motivate and develop a diverse workforce.
• Deep knowledge of production processes, material management, and manufacturing technologies in the footwear industry.
• Strong problem-solving skills with a focus on process optimization and quality improvement.
• Excellent organizational and time management skills, with the ability to handle multiple tasks and meet deadlines.
• Solid understanding of quality control procedures, health and safety regulations, and environmental compliance.
• Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, to liaise effectively with cross-functional teams and clients.
• Results-driven with a focus on meeting client expectations and achieving operational goals.
• Detail-oriented, with a passion for maintaining high standards in product quality and safety.
• Adaptable and resilient in a fast-paced, dynamic manufacturing environment.

Location: 266-268 Nam Kỳ Khởi Nghĩa, Phường Võ Thị Sáu, Quận 3, 266-268 Nam Kỳ Khởi Nghĩa, Phường Xuân Hòa, TP.Hồ Chí Minh
Job Description:
1. Thu hút & tuyển dụng nhân tài:
• Xây dựng và triển khai chiến lược thu hút nhân sự trong từng thời kỳ.
• Xây dựng kế hoạch tuyển dụng nhân sự nhằm đáp ứng nhu cầu nhân sự hàng năm của Sacombank.
• Triển khai các bước tuyển dụng nhằm đáp ứng nhân sự cho các Đơn vị trên toàn hệ thống theo phân công.
• Thiết lập và quản lý dữ liệu ứng viên đầu vào (bao gồm dữ liệu về các ứng viên theo chế độ tuyển dụng nhân sự ngoại giao).
• Tuyển dụng, quản lý sinh viên kiến tập/thực tập, các Thực tập viên tiềm năng/các Học viên của Chương trình Học kỳ Sacombank và/hoặc các Chương trình khác hàng năm.
• Lập báo cáo tổng hợp, phân tích và đánh giá về công tác tuyển dụng theo tháng, quý, năm và các báo cáo đột xuất đối với Khu vực/Đơn vị phụ trách.

2. Phát triển thương hiệu nhà tuyển dụng:
• Thiết kế và triển khai thực hiện các chương trình nhằm xây dựng và phát triển thương hiệu tuyển dụng của Sacombank; đầu mối triển khai các hoạt động liên kết với các trường Đại học, Cao đẳng, Trung cấp trong các lĩnh vực định hướng nghề nghiệp ngành ngân hàng, chuẩn bị các kỹ năng nghề nghiệp, cơ hội kiến tập/thực tập/học việc/việc làm bán thời gian tại Sacombank đối với sinh viên.
• Đầu mối thiết kế, triển khai và quản lý chương trình học bổng Sacombank đối với đối tượng là sinh viên.
• Thiết kế và triển khai các Chương trình/Dự án nhằm chuyên nghiệp hóa, hiện đại hóa công tác tuyển dụng tại Sacombank.
Job Requirements:
• Trình độ: Tốt nghiệp Đại học chuyên ngành Luật, Quản trị nguồn nhân lực, Kinh tế lao động và tiền lương, Quản trị kinh doanh hoặc các chuyên ngành có liên quan.
• Kinh nghiệm: Có ít nhất 02 năm kinh nghiệm làm công tác Tuyển dụng nhân sự.
• Chuẩn tiếng Anh B1 (CEFR) hoặc các chứng chỉ tương đương theo từng thời kỳ.
• Sử dụng thành thạo vi tính văn phòng và các phần mềm ứng dụng.
• Yêu cầu khác:
- Kiến thức về tuyển dụng, đào tạo, C&B (tiền lương và chính sách phúc lợi) và Luật lao động; các chính sách đãi ngộ, phát triển nhân sự.
- Ưu tiên hiểu biết cơ bản về lĩnh vực Tài chính – Ngân hàng.
- Ưu tiên am hiểu về thị trường lao động và xu hướng phát triển.

Title: Technical Supervisor
Company: Knauf Vietnam
Location: Ho Chi Minh Office (Headquarter), Floor 7, Habour View Building, 35 Nguyen Hue Street, Dist 1, HCM City
Job Description:
• Technical Enquiry Co-ordination - This will involve supporting in developing project detailed blue-prints from initial information provided by Architect and Project Sales team members.
• Read the drawings from customers to prepare design presentation, shop drawing, system summary for project customers.
• Prepare CAD drawings, Technical Library.
• Responsible for the preparation of architectural detailed shop-drawings and working drawings (Architectural / structural) using Revit and ensuring that design and detail confirms to project construction.
• Assist Project Team by providing timely BIM Coordination and best knowledge with accurate information for construction.
• To extract information from 3D Revit and develop the shop-drawings and resolve discrepancies in the drawings with Engineering Department & Project Team.
• Reading and understanding VN standard.
• Calculate the structural when propose the design to the customer.
• Prepare mock-up, samples for Architect & Project Sales team and hand to customers if required. Coordinate with MKT to make sure sample, mock-up available to give customers.
• Customer Services - This will include working closely with the Architect and Project Sales team members to guarantee customer satisfaction, sending correspondence, following customer meetings when Project Sales Sup, Managers are not available
• Other tasks assigned by Line Manager
Job Requirements:
• Bachelor’s degree or higher in Architecture, Civil & Industrial Construction Engineering.
• 3 -4 years of experience of the construction industry would be an advantage
• The ability to understand architectural drawings, building construction techniques, concepts and principles
• Proficiency in AutoCAD, Revit, and BIM.
• Good command of English
• Be able to calculate the simple structural (internal partition and external wall) by using engineer software.

Title: Nhân Viên Kinh Doanh (Thiết Bị Y Tế)
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Vietmedic
Location: Huế, Việt Nam, Da Nang, Vietnam, các tỉnh miền Trung, TT1-A40 KĐT Văn Quán - Yên Phúc, phường Hà Đông, TP Hà Nội, Việt Nam
Job Description:
Địa điểm làm việc: Khu vực miền Trung
Báo cáo cho: Trưởng phòng kinh doanh

MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC:
- Am hiểu và nắm vững các sản phẩm của công ty và nhu cầu của các Khách hàng.
- Phụ trách giới thiệu và bán các sản phẩm công ty phân phối ở một khu vực địa lý xác định được phân công.
-Sắp xếp các cuộc hẹn, các buổi giới thiệu sản phẩm của công ty với khách hàng.
- Thuyết trình về sản phẩm, thuyết phục khách hàng sử dụng sản phẩm.
- Tìm kiếm khách hàng có nhu cầu và đánh giá khả năng triển khai sản phẩm mới tại các khu vực thị trường mình phụ trách.
- Thu thập, tổng hợp thông tin kịp thời về các Dự án/Thầu/Mua sắm trang thiết bị Y tế của các Bệnh viện, Sở Y tế,...., lập và gửi Báo giá danh mục hàng hoá cho khách hàng, theo sát kế hoạch mua sắm hàng hoá, mua Hồ sơ thầu và tham gia đấu thấu với các mặt hàng công ty kinh doanh.
- Tìm kiếm và cung cấp thông tin về các đối thủ cạnh tranh.
- Trao đổi thông tin về nhu cầu các loại vật tư thiết bị y tế của Khách hàng, đề xuất ý tưởng chiến lược và phát triển sản phẩm phù hợp.
- Thực hiện và theo dõi tiến trình mua hàng, ký kết hợp đồng, Bàn giao nghiệm thu hàng hoá. Phối hợp với các bộ phận có liên quan để giao hàng và các giấy tờ liên quan theo đúng các điều khoản yêu cầu trong hợp đồng hoặc yêu cầu từ phía Khách hàng.
- Lập Yêu cầu đặt hàng theo hợp đồng/ theo nhu cầu khách lẻ, gửi các bộ phận liên quan để chuẩn bị hàng hóa sẵn sàng giao cho khách hàng.
- Xử lý các vấn đề phát sinh liên quan đến sản phẩm, chăm sóc khách hàng sau bán hàng.
- Theo dõi công nợ của khách hàng mình phụ trách. Nhận báo cáo công nợ từ kế toán, phối hợp với Sales Admin hoàn thiện Hồ sơ thanh toán và thu hồi công nợ đến hạn.
- Lập các báo cáo theo yêu cầu của quản lý.
- Hỗ trợ các thành viên trong nhóm và bộ phận khác.
Job Requirements:
- Tốt nghiệp Cao đẳng / Đại học Y Dược
- Ưu tiên ứng viên hiện đang sinh sống ở Huế hoặc Đà Nẵng
- Đã có 2-5 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc tại vị trí Nhân viên Kinh doanh trong ngành Thiết bị và vật tư y tế
- Kỹ năng tư vấn, đàm phán thuyết phục khách hàng tốt, nhanh nhẹn trong xử lý tình huống
- Chịu được áp lực cao
- Sử dụng thành thạo MS Office và sử dụng tốt công cụ Internet để tìm kiếm thông tin hiệu quả.
- Yêu thích công việc và gắn bó dài lâu

QUYỀN LỢI & CHẾ ĐỘ:
1. Thu nhập: Lương cứng từ 7-12 triệu + lương kinh doanh
2. Chế độ theo luật lao động: BHXH, BHYT, nghỉ phép, nghỉ lễ tết,…
3. Gói khám sức khỏe định kỳ hàng năm cho nhân viên và bố mẹ
4. Thưởng ngày lễ 30/4, 2/9, thưởng tháng lương 13, quà sinh nhật
5. Nghỉ mát hàng năm cho nhân viên và gia đình
6. Phụ cấp điện thoại, xăng xe, ăn trưa
7. Làm việc trong môi trường thân thiện
8. Nghỉ phép 12 ngày/năm
9. Thời gian làm việc: 8h-17h từ Thứ Hai - thứ Sáu
10. Thời gian thử việc: 02 tháng
Field: Dịch vụ Y tế/Chăm sóc sức khỏe
